mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.company_id AS "companyId", a.biz_id AS "biz.id", a.book_id AS "book.id", book.code AS "book.code", book.name AS "bookName", book.category AS "book.category", a.direction AS "direction", a.fixed AS "fixed", a.category AS "category", a.status AS "status", a.select_type AS "selectType", a.group_tag AS "groupTag", a.use_count AS "useCount", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
